1: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>The word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֵלַ֥י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>came again unto me saying</n>
2: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Son</n> אָדָ֕ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> שִׂ֥ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>set</n> פָּנֶ֖יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>thy face</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>toward</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the sons</n> עַמּ֑וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <sup>5012 </sup> <n>and prophesy</n> עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n>
3: וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And say</n> לִבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>to the sons</n> עַמּ֔וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> שִׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> דְּבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>the word</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>of the Lord</n> יְהוִ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> כֹּה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֡ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> יַעַן֩ <sup>3282 </sup> <n>Because</n> אָמְרֵ֨ךְ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Because thou saidst</n> הֶאָ֜ח <sup>1889 </sup> <n>Aha</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and against</n> מִקְדָּשִׁ֣י <sup>4720 </sup> <n>against my sanctuary</n> כִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> נִחָ֗ל <sup>2490 </sup> <n>when it was profaned</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and against</n> אַדְמַ֤ת <sup>127 </sup> <n>and against the land</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> נָשַׁ֔מָּה <sup>8074 </sup> <n>when it was desolate</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and against</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and against the house</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> הָלְכ֖וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>when they went</n> בַּגּוֹלָֽה׃ <sup>1473 </sup> <n>into captivity</n>
4: לָכֵ֡ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>therefore</n> הִנְנִי֩ <sup>2005 </sup> <n>I am going</n> נֹתְנָ֨ךְ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Behold therefore I will deliver</n> לִבְנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>thee to the men</n> קֶ֜דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>of the east</n> לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֗ה <sup>4181 </sup> <n>for a possession</n> וְיִשְּׁב֤וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and they shall set</n> טִירֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <sup>2918 </sup> <n>their palaces</n> בָּ֔ךְ וְנָ֥תְנוּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>in thee and make</n> בָ֖ךְ מִשְׁכְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>4908 </sup> <n>their dwellings</n> הֵ֚מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> יֹאכְל֣וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>in thee they shall eat</n> פִרְיֵ֔ךְ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>thy fruit</n> וְהֵ֖מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> יִשְׁתּ֥וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and they shall drink</n> חֲלָבֵֽךְ׃ <sup>2461 </sup> <n>thy milk</n>
5: וְנָתַתִּ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will make</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רַבָּה֙ <sup>7237 </sup> <n>Rabbah</n> לִנְוֵ֣ה <sup>5116 </sup> <n>a stable</n> גְמַלִּ֔ים <sup>1581 </sup> <n>for camels</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and the sons</n> עַמּ֖וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> לְמִרְבַּץ־ <sup>4769 </sup> <n>a couchingplace</n> צֹ֑אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>for flocks</n> וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and ye shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n> ס
